Text: Register for the Markets Forumfor the Markets Forum Markets Forum February San Francisco Grand Hyatt on Union Square There are a lot of conferences out there that claim to address issues that are critical to online markets This is the conference that delivers on that claim This is the conference that will educate you about how offline market fundamentals apply to your online market This is the conference that will answer your regulatory questions This is the conference that introduces you to real liquidity providers This is the conference that breaks down the lifecycle of a trade to find out what is working and why This is the only conference presented by a nonprofit association that is working to help establish the industry Register TODAY at wwwatmarketsorg Markets Forum
